name: Gladiator Game
description:
Here is my second video game project made with Unreal Engine 4.

For this project I worked with Max Brun for 2 weeks.

The goal was to create a simple gladiator game with Unreal Engine 4 Behaviour trees. We used C++ for this project and avoid blueprint in order to learn how to use Unreal Engine 4.

You can play this game with a keyboard/mouse combo or a controller (Tested with XBOX One controller but shold work with most of them).
